page.title: 13HAUGHTON AND DISTRICT W.I.
page.content: Since the closure of the village school the Women's Institute is the only meeting place for the women of the surrounding area, providing a chance to meet and discuss a wide range of subjects. Visiting speakers cover hobbies and topics of interest. The W.I. helps a newcomer to get to know her neighbours. We join up with larger groups throughout the county to play badminton, bowls, scrabble and bridge; we are kept busy learning upholstery and cake icing; we organise trips to the theatre, even put on our own plays. Our talented members can arrange flowers,sew, paint, cook and even spin their own yarns. The Institute also helps to organise a youth club and informal socials for the older people in the area, providing a focal point for the whole community.
